name: Ioannis Z. Emiris
content: Ioannis Emiris Ioannis Emiris President and General Director ATHENA Research Center, Greece Tel: +30-2106875301 [last_name]Â  athenarc DOT gr Professor Lab of Geometric & Algebraic Algorithms Department of Informatics & Telecoms National & Kapodistrian University of Athens Member of joint team AROMATH, INRIA Sophia-Antipolis, France. MSCA Network grapes (2019-23) Collaborators / students, Teaching Publications: local (+ some talks), DBLP, arxiv.org, MathSciNet Software (old): geometric & algebraic Editor: J. Symbolic Computation, Applicable Algebra in Engineering, Communication & Computing, Math in Computer Science ex-Scientific board member, Hellenic Foundation of Research & Innovation former Director of MSc in Data Science and Information Technologies 2002-2021: full time faculty, U. Athens, Greece 1995-2002: tenured researcher, INRIA Sophia-Antipolis, France 1994: PhD in Computer Science, U.C. Berkeley. 1989: BSc-Eng in Computer Science, Princeton University. Instructions for internship requests, theses / recommendation letters (in Greek)
